definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: settle down, abide, dwell (NH id.; Sir 43:17 d +; Ph. [[שכן]] Lzb:375; Aram. [[שְׁכֵין]]; Syr. 4ken, all dwell; Ar. sakana rest, dwell, cf. As. šakânu, set, lay, deposit, set up (a dwelling), intrans. be situated (of city), maškanu, place, dwelling-place);—

definitions.title: Pi. 1
definitions.body: ), etc.; Pt. [[שׁׂכֵן]] Ge 14:13 +, [[שׁׂכְּ נִי]] (Ges:§ 90 l m) De 33:16 + 3 t.; sf. fs. [[שׁׂכַנְתְּי]] Je 51:13; Pt. pass., appar. pl. cstr. c. art, [[הַשְּׁכוּנֵי]] Ju Jdg 8:11 (but corrupt, n.pr.loc. needed, v. GFM):—
settle down to abide:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of pers.: encamp Nu 24:2 (E); settle permanently Ps 102:29 (abs.: ‖[[יִכּוֹן]]); [[כמלך]] ´[[שׁ]]: Job 29:25 (‖[[ישׁב ]]); settle down (to remain) Ju Jdg 5:17; [[תַּחְתָּיו]] 2Sa 7:10 = 1Ch 17:9 (not to be removed); esp. at rest, peace, in security, [[לבטח]] Je 23:6, Je 33:16, De 33:12, cf. [[בין כתפים]] v:De 33:12; Ps 16:9 (‖ [[שׂמח]]); [[בטח]] De 33:28, Pr 1:33; [[בדד]]([[ל]]) Nu 23:9 (poem) Je 49:31, Mic 7:14; land of Egypt Je 46:26 (remain undisturbed), so Je 50:39, Is 13:20 (‖[[תֵּשֵׁב ]], cf. [[ישׁב]]
); c. [[מרומים]] Is 33:16; abs. Na 3:18, subj. [[אדּירים]] (We [[רָֽשְׁנוּ]], Now [[יִשְׁכְּבוּ]]; ‖[[נׇמוּ ]]); Pr 7:11 her feet tarry not in her house.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of animals: [[כְּלָבִיא]] De 33:20; [[ב]] loc. Is 34:11, Job 37:8; [[שָׁם]] Is 13:21; birds [[תַּחַת]] ´[[שׁ]]: (under) Ez Eze 17:23, [[בְּחֵל]] ´[[שׁ]]: v:Eze 17:23; c. [[עַל]] = upon Eze 31:13, = by Ps 104:12; c. acc. [[סֶלַע]] Job 39:28; abs., of man under fig. of bird, [[אָע֫וּפָה וְאֶשְׁכָּׂנׇה]] Ps 55:7.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: things: c. [[עַל]] of cloud, Job 3:5 settle down over; cf. Ex 24:16, Ex 40:35, Nu 9:17, Nu 9:18, Nu 9:22 (a11 P); c. [[בְּ]] Nu 10:12 (P).
abide, dwell:

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of the dead: [[שׁׂכְנֵי עָפָר]] Is 26:19 (‖[[רְפָאִים ]]); cf. Job 26:5 (‖ id.), so mortals; [[שׁׂכְנֵי בָתֵּי תׂמֶר]] Job 4:19; [[דוּמָה]] ´[[שׁ]]: Ps 94:17 (i.e. [[שׁאול]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of God: [[בָּֽעֲרָפֶל]] ´[[שׁ]]: 1Ki 8:12 = 2Ch 6:1 (poem); [[מָרוֹם]] Is 33:5; [[עַד]] Is 57:15; [[מָרוֹם וְקָדוֹשׁ]] v:Is 57:15; [[סְנֶה]] De 33:16 (theoph.); [[בְּאָֽהֳלֵי־שֵׁם]] Ge 9:27 (J, v. Br:MP 82; al. Japheth subj.); [[בְּתוֹכָם]] Ex 25:8, Ex 29:46, Nu 5:3 (all P), Ez Eze 43:9; c. [[בְּתוֹח]] elsewh. Ex 29:45 (P) + 6 t.; [[ב]] loc. Ps 85:10; later [[בְּחִיּוֹן]] Joe 4:17, Joe 3:21; [[חִיּוֹן]] Is 8:18; Ps 68:17, Ps 68:19 (abs.) + 4 t.; [[שׁׂכֵן יְרוּשָׁלִַם]] Ps 135:21.

make settle down, establish: [[בָּֽאָדָֽם]] ´[[אׂהֶל שׁ]]: Ps 78:60 esp. in Dt, [[לְשַׁכֵּן שְׁמוֹ שָׁם]] establish his name there (cf. šakan šuma as Canaanism Wkl:TelAm.138 Rev 20; 181.6) De 12:11, De 14:23, De 16:2, De 16:6, De 16:11, De 26:2, cf. Je 7:12, Ne 1:9; + [[לָשׂוּם אֶתִ־שְׁמוֹ שָׁם לְשִׁכְנוֹ]] De 12:5 (rd. [[לְשַׁכְּנוֹ]]).
make to dwell: c. acc. pers., [[ב]] loc., Nu 14:30 (J) Je 7:3, Je 7:7. †

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. [[הִשְׁכַּ֫נְתִּי]] Ez Eze 3:24; Impf. 3 ms. juss. [[כבודי לעפר]] Ps 7:6, [[וַיַּשְׁכֵּן]] Ge 3:24, Ps 78:55, etc.;—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: lay, [[כבודי לעפר]] lay my honour in the dust (of death); place, set, Ge 3:24 (J); place, establish, [[אהל מועד]] at Shilo Jos 18:1 (P).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: cause birds to settle, [[עַל]] Ez Eze 32:4.
cause to dwell, c. acc. pers., [[ב]] loc., Ps 78:55; cf. Job 11:14.
